edu.ncsu.csc216.tracker.model

Class RequirementsTrackerModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.tracker.model.RequirementsTrackerModel

  • public class RequirementsTrackerModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to maintain the RequirementList and handles the activity around loading, saving, creating new RequirementLists.
    Author:
    jhnguye4

        public static RequirementsTrackerModel getInstance()
        This is the method that will be used to handle the activity of loading, saving, and creating RequirementLists.
        Returns:
        instance of RequirementTrackerModel

      • saveRequirementsToFile

        public void saveRequirementsToFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        This method saves the RequirementList to a file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - is the output file name
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if file cannot be saved

      • createNewRequirementsList

        public void createNewRequirementsList()
        Creates a new RequirementList and sets the counter to 0

      • loadRequirementsFromFile

        public void loadRequirementsFromFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Loads an xml file into a RequirementList. First creates and empty RequirementList then calls upon RequirementReader to store the Reqs.
        Parameters:
        fileName - is the file being read and its values stored in a RequirementList

      • deleteRequirementById

        public void deleteRequirementById(int reqId)
        This method deletes a Requirement depending on the id being passed through
        Parameters:
        reqId - is RequirementId of the Requirement and if they match then it will be deleted

      • getRequirementById

        public Requirement getRequirementById(int reqId)
        Returns a Requirement depending on if the RequirementId exists in the RequirementList
        Parameters:
        reqId - is the Id that will searched for in the RequirementList
        Returns:
        Requirement that is returned if ids match

      • getRequirementListAsArray

        public java.lang.Object[][] getRequirementListAsArray()
        Creates a 2D array of all the requirements in the RequirementList. This methods purpose is for the GUI
        Returns:
        Object which is a 2D array

      • executeCommand

        public void executeCommand(int reqId,
                           Command c)
        This method is used to update the state of the Requirement. The id is used to locate which Requirement to be updated and the command param has the information that it will be updated to.
        Parameters:
        reqId - is the id of the user that you want to update
        c - command is the Command object that has all the information needed to update the Requirement

      • addRequirement

        public void addRequirement(java.lang.String summary,
                           java.lang.String acceptanceTestId)
        This method is used to create a new Requirement and add it to RequirementList
        Parameters:
        summary - is the summary that the new Requirement will be set with
        acceptanceTestId - is the acceptanceTest that will be set in the Requirement
